SELECT DISTINCT ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID, ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_VRSN_ID AS VERSION, CLS.MNEMONIC AS CLASS, MOOD.MNEMONIC AS MOOD, TYP.MNEMONIC AS TYPE, CASE WHEN POL.POL_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'X' ELSE TPL_DEF_TBL.MNEMONIC END AS TEMPLATE, -- PRIVATE ENCOUNTERS THE TEMPLATE CAN DISCLOSE THE TYPE OF ENCOUNTER STS.MNEMONIC AS STATUS, ACT_VRSN_TBL.NEG_IND AS NEGATED, ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_UTC AS ACT_TIME, ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_START_UTC AS START_TIME, ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_STOP_UTC AS STOP_TIME, RSN.MNEMONIC AS REASON, GEO_TBL.LAT, GEO_TBL.LNG, ACT_VRSN_TBL.CRT_UTC AS CREATED_TIME, COALESCE(CRT_PROV_TBL.USR_ID, CRT_PROV_TBL.DEV_ID) AS CREATED_BY, ACT_VRSN_TBL.OBSLT_UTC AS OBSOLETE_TIME, COALESCE(OBS_PROV_TBL.USR_ID, OBS_PROV_TBL.DEV_ID) AS OBSOLETE_BY, AUT.ENT_ID AS AUTHOR, PRF.ENT_ID AS PERFORMER, RCT.ENT_ID AS RECORD_TARGET, POL.POL_ID IS NOT NULL AS MSK, TG.TAG_ID IS NOT NULL AS BACK_ENTRY FROM ACT_VRSN_TBL INNER JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL CLS ON (ACT_VRSN_TBL.CLS_CD_ID = CLS.CD_ID AND CLS.HEAD) INNER JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL MOOD ON (MOD_CD_ID = MOOD.CD_ID AND MOOD.HEAD) INNER JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL STS ON (ACT_VRSN_TBL.STS_CD_ID = STS.CD_ID AND STS.HEAD) INNER JOIN SEC_PROV_TBL CRT_PROV_TBL ON (ACT_VRSN_TBL.CRT_PROV_ID = CRT_PROV_TBL.PROV_ID) LEFT JOIN ACT_PTCPT_TBL RCT ON (ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID = RCT.ACT_ID AND RCT.ROL_CD_ID = '3F92DBEE-A65E-434F-98CE-841FEEB02E3F' AND RCT.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ACT_PTCPT_TBL AUT ON (ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID = AUT.ACT_ID AND AUT.ROL_CD_ID = 'F0CB3FAF-435D-4704-9217-B884F757BC14' AND AUT.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ACT_PTCPT_TBL PRF ON (ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID = PRF.ACT_ID AND PRF.ROL_CD_ID = 'FA5E70A4-A46E-4665-8A20-94D4D7B86FC8' AND PRF.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) LEFT JOIN SEC_PROV_TBL OBS_PROV_TBL ON (ACT_VRSN_TBL.OBSLT_PROV_ID = OBS_PROV_TBL.PROV_ID) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL TYP ON (TYP_CD_ID = TYP.CD_ID AND TYP.HEAD) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL RSN ON (RSN_CD_ID = RSN.CD_ID AND RSN.HEAD) LEFT JOIN GEO_TBL ON (GEO_TBL.GEO_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.GEO_ID) LEFT JOIN TPL_DEF_TBL ON (TPL_DEF_TBL.TPL_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.TPL_ID) LEFT JOIN ACT_POL_ASSOC_TBL POL ON (POL.ACT_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID AND POL.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ACT_TAG_TBL TG ON (TG.ACT_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID AND TG.TAG_NAME = 'isBackEntry' AND TG.TAG_VALUE IN ('true','True')) WHERE ACT_VRSN_TBL.HEAD = TRUE

OBS_PROV_TBL.PROV_ID) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL TYP ON (TYP_CD_ID = TYP.CD_ID AND TYP.HEAD = TRUE) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL RSN ON (RSN_CD_ID = RSN.CD_ID AND RSN.HEAD) LEFT JOIN GEO_TBL ON (GEO_TBL.GEO_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.GEO_ID) LEFT JOIN TPL_DEF_TBL ON (TPL_DEF_TBL.TPL_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.TPL_ID) LEFT JOIN ACT_POL_ASSOC_TBL POL ON (POL.ACT_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID AND POL.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ACT_TAG_TBL TG ON (TG.ACT_ID = ACT_VRSN_TBL.ACT_ID AND TG.TAG_NAME = 'isBackEntry' AND TG.TAG_VALUE IN ('true','True')) WHERE ACT_VRSN_TBL.HEAD = TRUE
